mapper.select: SELECT p.pay_id, b.book_img, b.book_name, p.pay_amount, o.order_date FROM book_order o, book b, pay p WHERE o.order_id = p.order_id AND o.book_id = b.book_id AND o.person_id = #{person_id}

SELECT b.book_img, b.book_name, b.book_m_price, b.book_sell_state, p.pick_id FROM book b, pick p, person person WHERE b.book_id = p.book_id AND p.person_id = person.person_id AND p.pick_state = 'Y' AND person.person_id = #{person_id}
SELECT o.order_date, m.mileage_point, m.mileage_kind FROM mileage m, pay p, book_order o WHERE m.pay_id = p.pay_id AND p.order_id = o.order_id AND o.person_id = #{person_id}
SELECT b.book_img, b.book_name, b.book_m_price, b.book_publish FROM book b, person p, book_order o WHERE b.book_id = o.book_id AND o.person_id = p.person_id AND o.person_id = #{person_id}
